name: Princess of Persia
description:
NOTE: This build of the game is just made for the submission deadline and it is missing so-many-features, we will submit the update ASAP!  

The game is inspired by traditional Iranian shadow theatre where the protagonist is spreading the light to the world through non-violent gameplay with simple puzzle platformer challenges.

Controls keyboard:

  • WASD or Arrows to move
  • Space to jump
  • Left or right control to hide
  • F to dance

Controls controller:

  • Dpad to move
  • South button to jump
  • West button to dance
  • East button to hide
